sentences.english: Myr Welder has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.
sentences.chinese: 祕耳焊工具有所有被它放逐之牌的所有起動式異能。

sentences.english: Assistant to manager of accounting department of a joint venture enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 一家合資企業會計北京電焊工求職經理的助理。

sentences.english: A welder wears goggles to protect his eyes from being burned.
sentences.chinese: 電焊工戴着護目鏡防止眼睛被灼傷。

sentences.english: Objective The economic and social benefits of welder pneumoconiosis prevention were studied.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討電焊工塵肺預防的經濟效益和社會效益。

sentences.english: Investigate its reason, experts doubt and electric welders are concerned.
sentences.chinese: 究其原因，專家懷疑與電焊工有關。

sentences.english: Doing it in intrinsics feels like surgery with welder's gloves on.
sentences.chinese: 在內部函數這樣做，感覺就像手術對焊工手套。

sentences.english: Conclusion The key of decreasing disease burden is that welder pneumoconiosis being prevented.
sentences.chinese: 結論預防電焊工塵肺發病是減少其疾病負擔的關鍵。

sentences.english: The welder is a mature technical type found in all urban and rural areas in China.
sentences.chinese: 電焊工是在中國任何城鄉都可以找到的成熟技術工種。

sentences.english: A welder who works in the round-house at the Chicago and Northwestern Railway Company's Proviso yard.
sentences.chinese: 電焊工在芝加哥和西北鐵路公司碼頭廠房工作。

sentences.english: With welder certificate, minimal 1 year welding experience.
sentences.chinese: 持有焊工上崗操作證，從事鋁焊工作一年以上。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the status of health in the welders.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查電焊工人的職業健康狀況。

sentences.english: Welder making boilers for a ship, Combustion Engineering Company.
sentences.chinese: 焊工爲船舶製造鍋爐，燃燒工程公司。

sentences.english: The technical school trains mechanicians, welders, shop assistants, seamstresses and hairdressers.
sentences.chinese: 技校培養機修工，焊工，店員，裁縫和理髮師。

sentences.english: A preliminary investigation implicates unqualified welders
sentences.chinese: 初步調查牽連了不合格的電焊工人。

sentences.english: A welding overseer picks up$ 400a week.
sentences.chinese: 電焊工監工每週掙400英鎊。

definition: plumbing and electrical work/tradesman who does both plumbing and electrical work
kind of work in production (e.g. benchwork, foundry work etc)
